explanation: The stage direction describes Arlequin changing his clothing and accessories, including his 'Juste-au-corps', hat, and soufflet, which are all objects. The category 'object' best fits this description because it involves the character interacting with objects, specifically changing or transforming them.
stgdir: Arlequin, pendant ce temps, change de Juste-au-corps et de chapeau, et paraît en boulanger, avec une chemisette rouge et un bonnet de laine, et son soufflet se trouve changé en charrette.
